product_name: The North Face Freedom Insulated Pants - Men's Short Sizes
long_description: The North Face Freedom insulated pants have a short inseam and deliver waterproof protection and insulating warmth to keep you comfortable throughout your winter fun, from slopes to parking lot. 2-layer HyVent(R) shell pants are waterproof, windproof and breathable; seams are sealed to prevent moisture from seeping through. 60g Heatseeker(TM) polyester fiber insulation helps keep your legs warm while you're romping about in the snow; insulation packs down easily for compact stowing of pants. Pants have a short inseam length and a relaxed fit with articulated knees for excellent freedom of movement. Chimney Venting(TM) design uses StretchVent(TM) gaiters and zippered thigh vents with mesh gussets to let you control airflow and your comfort. Rip-and-stick tabs on waistband adjust the fit; zippered, snap-closure fly. Zippered handwarmer pockets; single thigh cargo pocket. The North Face Freedom Insulated pants feature reinforced cuffs that resist abrasion from boots, boards and skis.
short_description: The North Face Freedom insulated pants have a short inseam and deliver waterproof protection and insulating warmth to keep you comfortable throughout your winter fun, from slopes to parking lot.
